name: Astro Symposium - Gravitas Sep '23
desc: Astro Symposium is a cosmic journey featuring renowned ISRO scientists and TEDx speakers, offering workshops, conferences, and interactive experiences to ignite young minds with the wonders of the universe.

name: Celestial Dive - Gravitas Sep '23
desc: Celestial Dive offers an immersive astronomical experience. Participants delve into celestial wonders through informative workshops and hands-on stargazing sessions equipped with state-of-the-art telescopes.

name: Cosmic Walk 2.0 - Apr '24
desc: Cosmic Walk, an evening under the stars, igniting passion for astronomy. Participants embarked on a journey through constellations, capturing the cosmos through astrophotography.

name: Sky Forge - Gravitas Sep '23
desc: The workshop empowered participants to design their own rockets using Open Rocket software and provided a platform for aspiring engineers to explore the intricacies of rocket science.

name: Workshop On Celestia - Apr '24
desc: A full-day workshop on Celestia, a powerful open source astronomy simulation software. Attendees designed their own cosmic scenarios, delved into data analysis and learnt about customizing Celestia and made connections with the online astronomy community.

name: Cosmic Time Machine - Yantra Mar '24
desc: The workshop gave an insight on the exploration of the universe using the James Webb Space Telescope including its remarkable 'aerospace origami' design and it acting as a Cosmic time machine!
